title: David Letterman compares Amy Schumer to Richard Pryor

meta_data.description:
http://www.gq.com/story/david-letterman-interview-2017

GQ: What's funny today?
David Letterman: The Oh, Hello boys—Nick Kroll and John Mulaney—they, to me...

og.description:
http://www.gq.com/story/david-letterman-interview-2017

GQ: What's funny today?
David Letterman: The Oh, Hello boys—Nick Kroll and John Mulaney—they, to me, are the funniest thing I've seen in years. I think Norm Macdonald is without peer. Amy Schumer… I don't want to say she's like Richard...
og.title: David Letterman compares Amy Schumer to Richard Pryor
